description:
Why work for us?

At Incitec Pivot Limited (IPL) we are a relationship based company and working here is unlike any other role you’ve had.

We believe everyone on our team is important and having an inclusive workplace where talent, experience and perspectives of our people are pivotal in forging exceptional relationships with our customers.

We know products and technology do not fulfil the promise behind a brand, people do.

We strive to attract, develop and retain people for their passion, desire to perform, an ability to put others first and proactively serve customers.

Why IPL?

  • Ms Jeanne Johns commenced as Managing Director & CEO at IPL on 15 November 2017. Jeanne is a global executive and chemical engineer with over 25 years’ experience in international refining, petrochemicals, oil & gas industries.
  • As of 1  October 2018 our female workforce in Australia was 22% and 33% of our new hires for the financial year were female
  • We have several strategies in play to continue to improve our workplace values and embrace diversity.

Who are we?

IPL is a global diversified industrial chemicals company. IPL plays an essential role in the mining and agriculture industries which produce many of life’s daily essentials. Within Australia we directly employee over 1600 people and you will find us operating in every state providing numerous opportunities to every day Australians.   IPL is an ASX 100 Company operating in over 18 countries. IPL is divided into 3 main operating arms:

  • Incitec Pivot Fertilisers – Australia’s largest supplier of fertilisers;
  • Dyno Nobel – supplier of industrial explosives and blasting services; and
  • Global Manufacturing – producing a wider range of explosives, fertilisers and industrial chemicals.

What we offer

Our employers enjoy a broad range of career experiences and encourage our employees to have a good work/life balance with the use of IPL’s Flexible Work Policy and through IPL’s Work & Life Hub only support service.

Our diversity and inclusion approach

Our Inclusion strategy is supported from the top and owned by the Executive team and our CEO.

Our D&I approach consists of three guiding principles to guide the way we work and support each other every day: 

  • Respecting our differences: Our work places will be free of discrimination and harassment and inclusive of all people, regardless of differences.
  • Shaping our future organisation: IPL will nurture a diverse workforce, developing its people to create business sustainability and strength.
  • Building a flexible organisation: Providing opportunities for working arrangements that accommodate the needs of the company while balancing the diverse needs of its people at different stages in both career and life.

A snapshot of our of our Diversity and Inclusion initiatives are:

  • Targets set to increase % of women in our business
  • Flexible Work Policy
  • Specific female talent development program - My Potential Program designed to provide valuable tools to assist our high performing female talent achieve their career ambitions
  • Focus on annual events such as International Women’s Day
  • Partner with associations that support and inspire women to focus on their career paths.  

Your opportunities with us are endless. We have a diverse range of roles in both traditional and non-traditional areas. We hope you will consider IPL as an employer and we look forward to you joining our team and supporting you to achieve your career goals.
